segments.text: Kenvir ? Hi , it's Alice . I'm very sorry that I have a big favor to ask you again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How big , Alice ? Last time you said that , I ended up working overtime 4 nights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've got a huge load of typing and Mr . Brown has insisted I get it done by tomorrow afternoon . Could you help me to type half of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Alice . But this is the last time . I also have a lot of work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Kenvir . You're so kind .
segments.speaker: S1
